participants.name: 'Stephan Brewer, CPA, CTRS, JSM Tax
participants.title: President at Legacy Tax & Resolution Services & He's The Taxman

messages.message: Hey thank you for the connect!
Thank you tax man! It will be a 1099 so I'll have to set some aside next year's tax season.
We are happy to help with some tax planning.  Remember as an independent contractor, you may have a requirement to pay estimated payments.
Oh good point. I should just set myself up to pay quarterly like the pros do anyways.
Oh good point. I should just set myself up to pay quarterly like the pros do anyways.
Not necessarily.  Once you know your net income is going to be above $52K, you should consider operating as an entity.
This is great advice. Can I come to an office and pay you for a bit of information download?

Download away!  Go to our website at 
www.legacytaxresolutionservices.com
 and you will find lots more stuff.

What do you think of this? 
http://nwtrcc.org
